meanings.definition: The act or process of guiding or showing the way.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's guidance helped the students understand the math problem.
meanings.sent2: I always seek guidance from my parents when I have to make a tough decision.
meanings.sent3: The GPS gave me guidance, but I still managed to get lost!
meanings.sent4: Her guidance was like a beacon in the dark, leading us to safety.
meanings.sent5: The guidance counselor provided support and direction to the confused students.

meanings.definition: Advice or information aimed at resolving a problem or difficulty.
meanings.sent1: His guidance on the project was invaluable and helped us succeed.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's guidance on healthy eating habits improved my well-being.
meanings.sent3: I followed the guidance on the recipe, but my cake still turned out burnt!
meanings.sent4: Her guidance was a lifeline in the stormy sea of uncertainties.
meanings.sent5: The guidance from the expert paved the way for a smooth transition.

meanings.definition: The direction or supervision provided by someone in authority.
meanings.sent1: Under the guidance of the coach, the team won the championship.
meanings.sent2: The CEO's guidance steered the company towards greater success.
meanings.sent3: The robot malfunctioned, ignoring the guidance of its programmer.
meanings.sent4: Her guidance was like a steady hand on the rudder of a ship.
meanings.sent5: The guidance of the wise elder was revered by the entire village.
